SELECT CARD_ID, CARD_NM, CARD_SORT_NUM, EXPOSURE_YN, FIX_YN, SERVICE_CATEGORY, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DT FROM TB_CARD WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

SELECT CARD_ID, CARD_NM, CARD_SORT_NUM, EXPOSURE_YN, FIX_YN, SERVICE_CATEGORY, CARD_APP_ID, REG_ID, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DT FROM TB_CARD WHERE CARD_ID = #{cardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CARD ( CARD_ID, CARD_NM, CARD_APP_ID, CARD_SORT_NUM, EXPOSURE_YN, FIX_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT, SERVICE_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( #{cardId}, #{cardNm}, #{cardAppId}, #{cardSortNum}, #{exposureYn}, #{fixYn}, #{regId}, SYSDATE, #{updId}, SYSDATE, #{serviceCategory} )
mapper.delete:

mapper.select: SELECT tec.EVENT_CARD_ID, tec.SERVICE_CATEGORY, tec.EVENT_CARD_URL, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_START_DT, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_END_DT, tec.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, tec.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DT, tec.EVENT_CARD_TYPE, NVL(tc.CARD_NM,'-') AS CARD_NM FROM TB_EVENT_CARD tec LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CARD tc ON tec.CARD_ID = tc.CARD_ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY tec.REG_DT DESC

SELECT COUNT(EVENT_CARD_ID) FROM ( SELECT tec.EVENT_CARD_ID, tec.SERVICE_CATEGORY, tec.EVENT_CARD_URL, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_START_DT, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_END_DT, tec.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, tec.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DT, tec.EVENT_CARD_TYPE, tc.CARD_NM FROM TB_EVENT_CARD tec LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CARD tc ON tec.CARD_ID = tc.CARD_ID ) WHERE 1=1
AND SERVICE_CATEGORY = #{serviceCategory}

SELECT tec.EVENT_CARD_ID, tec.EVENT_CARD_URL, tec.SERVICE_CATEGORY, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_START_DT, TO_CHAR(tec.EXPOSURE_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPOSURE_END_DT, tec.CARD_IMG_FILE_NAME, tec.REG_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, tec.UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(tec.UPD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DT, tec.CARD_ID, NVL(tc.CARD_NM,' ') AS CARD_NM, tec.EVENT_CARD_TYPE FROM TB_EVENT_CARD tec LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CARD tc ON tec.CARD_ID = tc.CARD_ID WHERE tec.EVENT_CARD_ID = #{eventCardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_CARD ( EVENT_CARD_ID, SERVICE_CATEGORY, EVENT_CARD_URL, EXPOSURE_START_DT, EXPOSURE_END_DT, CARD_IMG_FILE_NAME, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT, CARD_ID, EVENT_CARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{eventCardId}, #{serviceCategory}, #{eventCardUrl}, TO_DATE(#{exposureStartDt},'yyyymmdd'), TO_DATE(#{exposureEndDt},'yyyymmdd'), #{cardImgFileName}, #{regId}, SYSDATE, #{updId}, SYSDATE, #{cardId}, #{eventCardType} )
